steps.message: PLACE eggs in saucepan large enough to hold them in single layer.
ADD cold water to cover eggs by 1 inch.
HEAT over high heat just to boiling.
REMOVE from burner and cover pan.
LET EGGS STAND in hot water about 12 minutes.
DRAIN immediately and serve warm. OR, cool completely under cold running water or in bowl of ice water, then REFRIGERATE.

name: hot chocolate
ingredients: whole milk or any milk of your choice

steps.message: In a large bowl, combine sugar, cocoa, and salt, and whisk to combine well.
pour 1 cup whole milk into a microwave-safe mug, and microwave on high just until hot. Add 2 tablespoons of cocoa mix, and stir to dissolve.
